overview: Tells the story of a protagonist joining a group through high-level competitors while working at the infamous counseling center. The horrible secrets hidden in a call center full of extraordinary things, such as the profanity of rude customers and new colleagues, are expected to bring frightening fun. In particular, the genre of digital content is notable for the horror genre. As the new employee who will lead the content, the new Cho Seung Hyun has been confirmed.
title: Alive
